sourcesContent:
/**
 * Styles to visually hide an element
 * but make it accessible to screen-readers
 */
export const visuallyHiddenStyle: React.CSSProperties = {
  border: "0",
  clip: "rect(0, 0, 0, 0)",
  height: "1px",
  width: "1px",
  margin: "-1px",
  padding: "0",
  overflow: "hidden",
  whiteSpace: "nowrap",
  position: "absolute",
}
